abstract.p: Dance work, White Mountain, Black Water, choreographed by Nai-Ni Chen and performed by Nai-Ni Chen Dance Company, which is part of Dance/New Jersey, will be featured during Discover Jersey Arts--Discover Dance/New Jersey at Community Theater in Morristown (S)

block.p: The traditions and life in the legendary land on the border between China and Korea are the basis for a dance work, ''White Mountain, Black Water,'' choreographed by Nai-Ni Chen and performed by the Nai-Ni Chen Dance Company, one of the consortium of professional dance companies that make up Dance/New Jersey.
It is one of the works that will be featured during Discover Jersey Arts -- Discover Dance/New Jersey to be presented at the Community Theater in Morristown next Saturday and Sunday.

The traditions and life in the legendary land on the border between China and Korea are the basis for a dance work, ''White Mountain, Black Water,'' choreographed by Nai-Ni Chen and performed by the Nai-Ni Chen Dance Company, one of the consortium of professional dance companies that make up Dance/New Jersey.
It is one of the works that will be featured during Discover Jersey Arts -- Discover Dance/New Jersey to be presented at the Community Theater in Morristown next Saturday and Sunday.

A new work by Randy James presented by Randy James Dance Works, a performance of Carolyn Dorfman's ''The Klezmer Sketch,'' which explores her family's Eastern European Jewish roots, and a salute to Broadway and tap by Deborah Mitchell are also among the works to be performed.
Tickets for the performances, open rehearsals, lectures and demonstrations are available through the Community Theater's box office at (973) 539-8008.
